item.title: [Python] Sentiment analysis with Python (word2vec)
item.description: I recently attended a Python study group sponsored by Team Zet Co., Ltd. The theme this time is "text emotion using word2vec “Analysis.” Honestly, it was a pungent theme for me who first touched Python a week ago, but maybe I’m going to experience how the grammar I’m studying now is being put into shape. I rushed into the train one day before the event. By the way, let’s leave this foreword and go into the main subject.
